Package episunsa

Class SimpleImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • episunsa.SimpleImage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Pixel>
    public class SimpleImage
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<Pixel>
    This class allow iterate over all pixels from a simple image and get information over all the pixels and change their RGB value. 

     SimpleImage img = new SimpleImage("flowers.jpg");
 for(Pixel p: img){
   p.setRed(0);
 }
 img.print();
    You also need to add episunsa.jar to your classpath.

      • iterator

        public java.util.Iterator<Pixel> iterator()
        Returns an iterator over the pixels in the image. The iteration is over columns and rows.
        Specified by:
        iterator in interface java.lang.Iterable<Pixel>

      • setImageSize

        public void setImageSize​(SimpleImage front)
        If the current Image is smaller than the front Image, resizes the current image. The current Image should be at least same size that front Image.
        Parameters:
        front - the image who should be less or equal size that the current image.
